metadata.description: Payment options and financing partners for VendingPreneurs

high.label: Good Credit
high.note: If Elective doesn't offer 18mo and client can't make 12mo work, move to Klarna

medium.label: Fair Credit
medium.note: If Elective doesn't offer 18mo and client can't make 12mo work, move to Klarna

low.label: Limited Credit
low.note: Limited options - Payva will approve anyone, Coach for extended terms

discovery_question: Do you roughly know what your credit score is?

payment_options.name: Split It
payment_options.best_for: Those who want to protect credit score
highlights: Must use personal credit card (not business CC)
Places a hold on card for full amount
Only charges monthly installment each month
Hold reduces as balance is paid down

payment_options.name: Elective
highlights: Price + 15% origination fee + APR (0% if good finances)
Ideal for credit score 650+ (can approve down to 550)
Lower to no APR on top of 15% fee
Credit/debit card only for 1st payment or down payment

payment_options.name: Payva
highlights: Can use credit or debit card

payment_options.name: Klarna
payment_options.best_for: Those who need longer terms (24mo vs 12mo)
highlights: Requires debit card for first payment
restrictions: Process can be clunky for tech-challenged clients

payment_options.name: Coach Financing
payment_options.best_for: Bad credit and/or flexible long-term plans
highlights: Good for bad credit and/or flexible long-term plans
Personal loan - extends past 24mo to reduce monthly payment
No initiation fee (PIF price once funded)
Best option when other financing is declined

payment_options.name: PayPal
payment_options.best_for: Niche use case - only if sales rep comfortable walking through
highlights: Pay in 4: 0% APR, $30-$1,500, 4 payments every 2 weeks
Pay in 4: Soft credit check - no impact on score
Pay Monthly: 3-24 month terms with fixed payments
PayPal Credit: 6mo no interest on $99+ if paid in full

creative_options: Split payments and use multiple cards
Make a partial payment and finance the remainder (15% only applies to financed amount)
Use multiple finance options (i.e. half Elective and half Payva)

cant_afford.script: I totally understand budget is a concern. The good news is we have several flexible payment options. Do you roughly know what your credit score is? That helps me point you to the best fit.

bad_credit.script: No worries at all - we work with everyone. Payva approves anyone regardless of credit, and Coach Financing offers terms up to 144 months to keep payments low.

need_longer_terms.script: We can definitely work with that. Klarna offers up to 24 months, and Coach Financing can go up to 144 months if you need really low monthly payments.

california_resident.note: Elective not available for California residents - use Klarna or Payva instead
